comments.text:
Ok so I'm new to all of this korean music etc, and I have to say I might 
have fallen in love with BTS and I clearly need help to know who is who 
because they are so many in this band.. Do they must be 7 in a band in 
K-pop? I'd like to know everything about K-pop right now, and I'd also like 
to knowcool bands and singers of J-pop. (I don't speak english fluently so 
sorry if there are mistakes.)﻿
comments.author: Maéva Belieber

comments.text:
+Maéva Belieber Don't worry if you don't know names. You can just enjoy the 
music if you want to! It should get easier to distinguish after a while but 
yea I agree about EXO/GG and other big groups. Been an EXO-L since October 
and still find it difficult to point out Suho one of the members and get 
another two mixed up all the time. If it helps I do have a couple tips for 
BTS members?

V- usually has his tongue out loads during MVs and reminds me of a little 
pixie or puppy. He has the deepest singing voice and never raps.

Kookie- usually has the most parts and has the sharpest jawline and 
smallest features I think. 

Namjoon- the deepest voiced rapper with visible dimples when he smiles. 
Doesn't always sing but he gives me chills when he does so maybe you too. 
Sort of husky singing voice.

Jin- look for big plump (and kissable) lips and big eyes.

J-Hope- long face and massive hands with long fingers.... makes me wonder 
about his foot size lol

Jimin- nearly always in a sleeveless top. Look for obvious muscle 
definition with a high sweet voice. Does most of the falsettos remember.

Yoongi- has a slight squeak/lisp when he raps. Is small and very very pale. 
Usually wears a hat or something tied in his hair.

Hope this helps more but as we said it's okay if you're not positive. Just 
enjoy :)
comments.author: Multidimensional

comments.text:
+Maéva Belieber Don't worry, you'll get the hang of it.

comments.author: Maéva Belieber

comments.text:
+Maéva Belieber Hi :)
Names:
Jungkook/Kookie is the first one you see at his desk

Suga/Yoongi (the one with the ball) and Rapmon(ster)/Namjoon who is beside 
him, 
Jimin's cleaning the bathroom, 
V/Taehyung with the manga or whatever that book is, 
J-Hope/Hoseok/Hobie yawning, 
Jin in the locker



Oldest to youngest (age to be this year): 
Jin (23), Yoongi (22), Joonie and Hobie (21), Jimin and Tae Tae (20) and 
Kookie (18)


Short profile:


Namjoon (D-A-N-C-E Monster/Appa Joonie)- the leader of the group and it's 
father figure, main rapper, is very clumsy and so is known to break a lot 
of stuff/lose things, is perhaps the worst dancer and used to hate dancing 
because he was so bad (though I think he's pretty good). Also sings really 
well and is known to cause eargasms with his voice and lyrics. See further 
'Trouble', 'Look Here' and 'Expensive Girl'


Jin (The Pink Princess/Eomma Jin)- loves pink, is the group's mother, is 
the visual and considered the best looking, is a vocal liner (singer), is 
famous for his shoulders, cooks to more or less chef standards and is good 
at the traffic light dance and the dislocated shoulder dance. Caused severe 
eargasms in 'Trouble'.


Yoongi (#Swagmeister)- rapper line, writes a lot of his own raps/lyrics and 
general songs for the group both on his own and with other members, is the 
grampa of the group, you do not ever disturb his sleep (gf travel neck 
pillow) can also sing and when really actively involved in Bangtan Bombs 
(search this they are great to get to know them) is great fun to watch.


Hobie (sweet and caring J-Horse)- dancer line but is a triple threat 
(sings, dances and raps), is known for his girl group dances with a 
particular obsession for 'Touch My Body' by Sistar. does cute concept stuff 
best in my opinion with especially cute noises, has a memorable 'dancing 
face', is the most caring arguably in the group and was nick named J-Horse 
because of the slightly long face. Particularly known touchy-feely person 
who loves skinship with the others- particularly Jimin and Tae.


Jimin (The Body/Sweet Boy)- dancer line but also sings (he does all the 
falsettos usually), has the best loved butt/thighs and over all body though 
insists Jin's is better. Is known for his sweet disposition never getting 
angry for long and forgiving Kookie for not calling him 'Hyung' which shows 
his older age and is tradition/denotes respect and therefore without is 
disrespectful. 


Tae (4D Alien)- vocal line, has a problem keeping his tongue in his mouth 
and has killer hip movements, is known for being a seriously outside the 
box thinker with the members considering him an alien (lovingly not in a 
bad way), is generally really innocent aside from tongue/hip thing, loves 
acting and wants to be in a movie or something. Fans consider him the love 
child of Daehyun from BAP and Baekhyun from EXO who are also aliens and 
look very like him.


Kookie (the golden maknae)- is the baby of the group at 17 (18 in 
September) which is why he is called the maknae, does everything really 
well (dances/sings/raps/beat boxes/girl group dance leader...) I could go 
on. School wise though if it's not music, art or p.e. he dislikes it. Is 
perhaps the sexiest when he tries to be which is bad news for noonas (older 
women) like me (I'm 22).


KPop bands can be all sorts of sizes but usually between 4/5 and 12 
members. EXO is I think the largest and had 12 and is now down to 10 (9 if 
another leaves like I've heard mentioned). It is maybe the best known and 
is amazing. I can't tel you all bands but my favs are EXO, BAP, BTOB, Block 
B, Infinite, (BTS), Girl's Day, Sistar, T-Ara, SNSD, CLC, AOA and 2NE1.Plus 
TVXQ or DBSK who broke up a while back but I just love their songs like 
'Mirotic and 'Pictures of You'. Solo wise there is ?Erik Namm? and 
especially need to check out Rain aka Bi-Rain. Anything from him is cool 
but especially '30Sexy' and 'Rainism'. Rainism also has an English version! 
Lots of the bands also release Chinese and Japanese song versions. BTS does 
nearly always- 'Danger', No More Dream', Boy in Luv.....


Can't help specifically JPop though :(
Vietnamese wise there is Thanh Bui? a cover of 'Pictures of you' and 
'Danger' a remix with English with BTS. I think he wrote the song but not 
positive.


Specific songs to check out outside of those mentioned:


AOA- Like a Cat, Mini Skirt and Short Hair
Girl's Day- Something
T-Ara- Suga Free
BtoB- You're So Fly and Wow
Block B- Romantically, HER, Jackpot, Very Good, Nilli Mambo, Nalina and 
Halo.
EXO- Call Me Baby, Growl, Wolf, Overdose, Black Pearl, Miracles in December
BAP- Stop It and Angel
BTS- I Need You, No More Dreams, (We Are) Bulletproof Part 2 (Part 1 is 
with others), Coffee, I Like It (aka Pretty Woman), You're My, Beautiful, 
Adult Child, Cypher Part 1, Cypher Part 2 and Cypher Part 3, Attack on 
Bangtan, Satoori Rap, N.O.... essentially everything from BTS (sorry major 
fan here so no pressure!)


Also watch some of the groups' interviews- on 'Weekly Idol' for example. 
And BTS has 'Bangtan Bombs' plus their shows American Hustle Life and 
Rookie King. All easily found on YT with English subs and usually Thai/Viet 
as well.


Hope this helps!!!! Let me know sure what you think and if I can welcome 
you into the KPop fandom.
